Plot: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based T.V. cop show.
Title: Showtime
Writer: Jorge Saralegui (story), Keith Sharon (screenplay), Alfred Gough (screenplay), Miles Millar (screenplay)
Actors: Robert De Niro, Rachael Harris, Eddie Murphy, Zaid Farid
tomatoConsensus: Showtime starts out as a promising satire of the buddy cop genre. Unfortunately, it ends up becoming the type of movies it is satirizing.
